title: Kirchhoff loop - circuit with R1 R2 emf1 and emf2

content.question: For the circuit diagram shown in the figure, the current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math> is in the clockwise direction. Which of the following equations expresses Kirchhoff’s loop rule for the circuit?

choices.label: <math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, plus open E sub 2, end sub, plus I R sub 1, end sub, plus I R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, minus open E sub 2, end sub, plus I R sub 1, end sub, plus I R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, plus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I R sub 1, end sub, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, minus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I R sub 1, end sub, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, plus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I R sub 1, end sub, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
